alert.note: Alert for Broome; Tioga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 20 at 12:42PM EST until December 21 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in New York...Pennsylvania... Susquehanna River At Vestal affecting Tioga and Broome Counties. Susquehanna River At Conklin affecting Broome and Susquehanna Counties. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in New York... Susquehanna River At Bainbridge affecting Delaware and Chenango Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Susquehanna River at Vestal. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Flood stage. The river overflows banks and lowland flooding begins within the flood plain. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:00 PM EST Wednesday the stage was 18.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 18.2 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 145 PM EST.
